setting.autoHighlightDesc: After opening, when text is selected, it will be automatically highlighted.
setting.noteShowClassDesc: After closing, the highlight style will only be displayed when the mouse slides over it.
setting.openNewDesc: If not, the reader will only be on the current page.
setting.openNewTitle: Whether the reader opens a new page
setting.openRecyleBinDesc: Close the Recycle Bin. When you delete a book, it will be permanently deleted instead of being moved to the Recycle Bin.
setting.openRecyleBinTitle: Turn on the recycle bin function
setting.remeberPositionDesc: After opening it, entering the reading interface again will automatically jump to the last reading position.
setting.remeberPositionTitle: Whether to remember the last reading position

unfound.desc:
Sorry, we can't find the page. 
You'll find a lot to explore on the home page.
unfound.title: The page is missing
